abstract: Facebook said on Monday that its chief operating officer, Sheryl Sandberg, has joined the social network’s board, becoming the first woman to serve as a director for the company.
snippet: Facebook said on Monday that its chief operating officer, Sheryl Sandberg, has joined the social network’s board, becoming the first woman to serve as a director for the company.
lead_paragraph: Facebook said on Monday that its chief operating officer, Sheryl K. Sandberg, had joined the social network’s board, becoming the first woman to serve as a director for the company.

headline.print_headline: Sandberg, Prominent Facebook Officer, Is Elevated to Its Board

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
